General.Name: Cross River Ventures Corp
General.Description: Cross River Ventures Corp. engages in the identification, evaluation, acquisition, and exploration of mineral properties. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. It holds interest in the McVicar lake property, Uchi Belt properties, and the Manitou project located in Northwestern Ontario, Canada. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender St, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
